page.title: 12KINMEL BAY LIBRARY.
page.content: Situated in the Kinmel Bay Community Centre which was opened in April 1985.The site is that of the former Church and houses a Health Clinic in addition to the Library and Community hall.There are over 10,000 volumes in stock and the issues are controlled by a computerised system known as a fiche.The weekly issues are approximately 800 adult issues and 500 childrens issues.The Librarian is Mrs Maureen Wyatt who is assisted by staff from the Abergele or Colwyn Bay branches.In addition the Library has displays of work from the two local schools as well as other community groups. Although only a limited proprotion of the local population is Welsh speaking there are both adult and childrens books in Welsh in stock.
